title: "Oh shit, they made another East Coast Thread on the new Forums and its popular again" -Tamat
body:
Edit: 69 upvotes, gj guys, feel the love, and you will feel it back ;)

"Maybe if we don't acknowledge that it doesn't exist and talk about poros and temporary game modes, they won't see it...Shit...it didn't work...it is still being bumped...Going to have to make a third forums...sigh...still cheaper than new servers, I mean they should be happy that we moved our servers from California to Oregon for maximum fair playing fields for our fellow Alaskan League of Legends Summoners (what are summoners?), we are confused why they are still bumping it, we have done nothing wrong, our servers are extremely sta-"

Edit: Tamat no longer works for Riot and GD is going to get deleted instead to permanently silence us.

Final Edit: Its happening, Riot killed another meme, they rather move the server instead of giving us a sandbox mode.
